content: When you reach the lava, go to the dark corner on the right to collect the green Wisp. As you approach, you'll be jumped by Scorching-Fire rocks, so be prepared. Then, go up the ramp on the left to meet another Earth Rakshasa and take this out.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
When you reach the lava, go to the dark corner on the right to collect the green Wisp. As you approach, you'll be jumped by Scorching-Fire rocks, so be prepared. Then, go up the ramp on the left to meet another Earth Rakshasa and take this out.
